snippet: A push to abolish the death penalty in Maryland cleared a major hurdle on Wednesday when the Senate approved the measure, which appears to have support from the House and Gov. Martin O’Malley.
abstract: Push to abolish death penalty in Maryland clears major hurdle when Senate approves measure, which appears to have support from House and Gov Martin O’Malley.
lead_paragraph: A push to abolish the death penalty in Maryland cleared a major hurdle on Wednesday when the Senate approved the measure, which appears to have support from the House and Gov. Martin O’Malley.
